text:
Welcome to your work space!

A donor has decided to build an aquarium in town. The donor wants the front entrance to contain a large tank with up to 30 colorful large fish (up to 2.5 pounds or 16 inches long) to make the aquarium exciting and inviting. The donor will pay for all materials and upkeep.

A team of students (you and your friends) have been invited to help design this tank.
